creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
description: three long rectangular panels hand-sewn on length to from wide bias wrap with long self fringed ends; four hand-woven ties--green gold and two pink ties; panels are: yellow/black plaid, red/green plaid, black/white; white cotton sewn label #137 at one end
dimension:
99 1/2 x 34 in. (252.73 x 86.36 cm)
11 1/2 in. (29.21 cm) (fringe)
8 1/4 in. (20.96 cm) (object part, hand-woven tabs, approximate)
13 in. (33.02 cm) (object part, pink tabs)
title: Man's Waist Wrap (Kusak)
